duties_responsibilities.duty: Leading the project controls processes with the internal project management team to execute project deliverables within budget and schedule.
Developing, implementing, and maintaining external and internal cost reports, cash flows, and forecasts.
Developing and maintaining schedules in Oracle Primavera P6 ranging from 20 to 200 activities.
Working with 5-6 project managers concurrently to support projects in various phases of design and construction.
Loading and maintaining resources within the schedule.
Ensuring quality checks and inspections on project controls deliverables.
Comparing schedules to financial data to ensure consistency of project timeline.
Ensuring project set-up in Oracle Financial MIS/PPS Accounting Module or Oracle Primavera Contracts Manager Program.
Communicating and understanding the technical progress of electric utility transmission lines, substations, and/or telecommunication projects.
Integrating schedule data and other data sources in Excel via formulas, pivot tables, macros, etc.
Analyzing data, reviewing logs, and running reports in Oracle Primavera Contracts Manager software and/or the Oracle Financials MIS/PPS Accounting software.
Setting up Work Breakdown Structure (WBS) for tracking a detailed breakdown of purchase orders or subcontracts.
Ensuring budget tracking against Purchase Orders or Subcontracts.
Managing the internal Change Management System.
Reviewing upstream (prime contract) / downstream (PO & subcontract) change orders.
Setting up Work Breakdown Structure (WBS) in Oracle Primavera 6 or Microsoft Project scheduling software.
Entering logic ties within the schedules.
Creating various schedule reports and determining the appropriate reporting formats.
Consulting with the project controls team on schedule progress.
Monitoring resource loading of a schedule.
Analyzing and reporting on data from Oracle Primavera P6.
Developing pre-programmed project scheduling reports in P6 and reviewing and analyzing backup documentation for accuracy.

education_certification.credential: Bachelor's degree in Engineering, Construction Management, or a related field. Applicable experience may be substituted for the degree requirement.
